attributes.action: Give the people of England the same rights as the other countries of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wales, Scotland and NI have all had their say in whether they want national parliaments. The people of England have not. Scotland and Wales have their own National anthems played before sporting events. England teams have the UK national anthem played before theirs. We demand an English anthem to be played before sporting events.
